description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Battle an onslaught of monsters in action packed stages, as you travel through time, learn new skills and even team up with a partner to save the future from an interstellar menace.
description.short: Battle an onslaught of monsters in action packed stages, as you travel through time, learn new skills and even team up with a partner to save the future from an interstellar menace.
